title: Anti-Israel Riots Rage In Montreal. Trudeau Spotted At Taylor Swift Concert
content: A video of Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau attending a Taylor Swift concert amid the ongoing violence in Montreal has drawn massive outrage on social media.
summary: A video of Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau attending a Taylor Swift concert amid the ongoing violence in Montreal has drawn massive outrage on social media.

title: Boy, 15, May Be Tried As Adult For Fatally Stabbing Teen Cheerleader In US
content: The 15-year-old suspect was arrested shortly after the incident and charged with second-degree murder
summary: The 15-year-old suspect was arrested shortly after the incident and charged with second-degree murder

title: NDTV Exclusive: UN Official Calls For Survivor-Centred Anti-Violence Laws
content: Melissa Alvarado, Regional Programme Manager for Ending Violence Against Women at UN Women, emphasised the importance of a survivor-centric approach when drafting laws and regulations to combat violence against women.
summary: Melissa Alvarado, Regional Programme Manager for Ending Violence Against Women at UN Women, emphasised the importance of a survivor-centric approach when drafting laws and regulations to combat violence against women.

title: McDonald's Launches Affordable 'McValue' Menu To Bring Back Customers
content: McDonald's global sales at outlets open at least a year fell by 1.5 per cent between July and September -- the biggest decline in four years.
summary: McDonald's global sales at outlets open at least a year fell by 1.5 per cent between July and September -- the biggest decline in four years.

title: 3 Cops Injured In Shooting Near Israeli Embassy In Jordan, Gunman Shot Dead
content: A gunman was dead and three policemen injured after a shooting near the Israeli embassy in neighbouring Jordan, a security source and state media said on Sunday.
summary: A gunman was dead and three policemen injured after a shooting near the Israeli embassy in neighbouring Jordan, a security source and state media said on Sunday.

title: Katy Perry Wins Trademark Case Against Australian Designer Katie Perry
content: The judges determined that Perry had used her name as a trademark for five years before Taylor began her clothing business.
summary: The judges determined that Perry had used her name as a trademark for five years before Taylor began her clothing business.

title: Salary Of Prisoners In UK More Than Jail Guards And Teachers: Report
content: The highest-paid inmate in the UK received a net pay of $46,005 last year, which means their gross salary was about $57,640.
summary: The highest-paid inmate in the UK received a net pay of $46,005 last year, which means their gross salary was about $57,640.

title: Elon Musk Richest Ever, But This Asian Billionaire Was 2024's Top Earner
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk might be the richest person in history, but he was way behind Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on the 2024 list of top earners.
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk might be the richest person in history, but he was way behind Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on the 2024 list of top earners.

title: Trump Picks Brooke Rollins, His Loyalist, As US Agriculture Secretary
content: Donald Trump on Saturday announced his pick for agriculture secretary -- the final top post in his incoming cabinet -- as policy advocate Brooke Rollins, a loyalist from his first term.
summary: Donald Trump on Saturday announced his pick for agriculture secretary -- the final top post in his incoming cabinet -- as policy advocate Brooke Rollins, a loyalist from his first term.

title: In China, These Giant Sinkholes Are Tourist Spots. But Experts Flag Risks
content: China's massive sinkholes, particularly those in Guangxi province, have gained massive popularity among tourists, drawing visitors eager to explore their ancient ecosystems.
summary: China's massive sinkholes, particularly those in Guangxi province, have gained massive popularity among tourists, drawing visitors eager to explore their ancient ecosystems.

title: "Her Husband Kept Asking For Dowry": Sister Of Indian, 24, Found Dead In UK
content: Days after 24-year-old Harshita Brella - an Indian woman from Delhi living with her husband in the UK - was found dead with her body stashed away in the boot of a car, his family has pointed to a dowry angle in the case.
summary: Days after 24-year-old Harshita Brella - an Indian woman from Delhi living with her husband in the UK - was found dead with her body stashed away in the boot of a car, his family has pointed to a dowry angle in the case.

title: "In The Name Of Globalisation, We Actually Hollowed Out...": S Jaishankar
content: In the name of open economy, we allowed other countries to get an advantageous playing field in the country and this has to stop, said External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Saturday.
summary: In the name of open economy, we allowed other countries to get an advantageous playing field in the country and this has to stop, said External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Saturday.

title: Israeli Strikes Kill 120 Palestinians In Gaza Over 48 Hours
content: Israeli military strikes across the Gaza Strip have killed at least 120 Palestinians over the last 48 hours and hit a hospital on the northern edge of the enclave, wounding medical staff and damaging equipment, Palestinian medics said on Saturday.
summary: Israeli military strikes across the Gaza Strip have killed at least 120 Palestinians over the last 48 hours and hit a hospital on the northern edge of the enclave, wounding medical staff and damaging equipment, Palestinian medics said on Saturday.

title: Storm Bert Strikes UK And Ireland, Brings Extreme Flooding And Travel Chaos
content: Britain and Ireland faced travel chaos on Saturday as a winter storm battered northwest Europe with strong winds, heavy rain, snow and ice.
summary: Britain and Ireland faced travel chaos on Saturday as a winter storm battered northwest Europe with strong winds, heavy rain, snow and ice.

title: 15 Killed In Israeli Strike On Beirut, Says Lebanon
content: Lebanon said an Israeli air strike in the heart of Beirut that brought down a residential building and jolted residents across the city killed at least 15 people on Saturday.
summary: Lebanon said an Israeli air strike in the heart of Beirut that brought down a residential building and jolted residents across the city killed at least 15 people on Saturday.

title: TikTok CEO Sought Musk's Input Ahead Of Trump Administration: Report
content: ByteDance-owned TikTok Chief Executive Officer Shou Zi Chew has sought input on US matters from Elon Musk, a close adviser to President-elect Donald Trump, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday.
summary: ByteDance-owned TikTok Chief Executive Officer Shou Zi Chew has sought input on US matters from Elon Musk, a close adviser to President-elect Donald Trump, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday.

title: Hamas Armed Wing Says Israeli Woman Hostage Killed In North Gaza
content: Hamas's armed wing said Saturday an Israeli woman taken hostage during the October 2023 attack had been killed in a combat zone in northern Gaza and the Israeli military said it was investigating.
summary: Hamas's armed wing said Saturday an Israeli woman taken hostage during the October 2023 attack had been killed in a combat zone in northern Gaza and the Israeli military said it was investigating.

title: Left Naked, Reality Show Contestant Survived For 15 Months Eating Dog Food
content: Unaware that he was being filmed, he competed in challenges for basic survival. His story of loneliness and struggle is now featured in a documentary.
summary: Unaware that he was being filmed, he competed in challenges for basic survival. His story of loneliness and struggle is now featured in a documentary.

title: "America Going Bankrupt Super Fast": Elon Musk Offers Solution
content: Billionaire Elon Musk, tasked by President-elect Donald Trump to rein in the excessive US spending, has warned that America could be nearing the verge of bankruptcy.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk, tasked by President-elect Donald Trump to rein in the excessive US spending, has warned that America could be nearing the verge of bankruptcy.

title: Court Respite For Musk After Market Regulator's Probe Into Twitter Takeover
content: A judge in the United States has rejected the request of the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to sanction tech billionaire Elon Musk for skipping a meeting with the regulator, to watch one of his rockets launch.
summary: A judge in the United States has rejected the request of the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to sanction tech billionaire Elon Musk for skipping a meeting with the regulator, to watch one of his rockets launch.
